children.name: Thank you for using CosmosLevel. We urge you to read carefully both the Terms and Conditions applicable to the account type you've opted for and this Personal Data Processing and Confidentiality Policy to be fully informed about how we handle and secure the personal data you provide to us.

CosmosLevel is a versatile SaaS (Software as a Service) platform designed to streamline the interaction between professionals and clients within an appointment-based business model. This innovative app facilitates a comprehensive suite of features to enable efficient management of appointments, services, and professional-client engagement across various industries.

For professionals, CosmosLevel provides a robust ecosystem to create and manage their service offerings. They can setup their availability with a connected calendar, design multi-language offers, and configure location preferences for in-person meetings or online sessions via integrations with Google Meet and Zoom. Professionals can also leverage the platform to define custom questions, helping to curate personalized experiences for their clients at the point of booking. For added convenience, professionals have the option to sync with their Google Calendar, check for scheduling conflicts, and employ smart scheduling options like time slot increments and minimum notice requirements before bookings.

Clients benefit from a seamless booking experience through a concise wizard that guides them from selecting a service to choosing a convenient date and time. Products associated with service offers can be selected, and reminders for scheduled appointments are sent out via email, ensuring a smooth preparatory process.

Combining these features with an intuitive user interface, CosmosLevel aims to elevate professionals' ability to attract and retain clients through efficient scheduling, customizable offerings, and seamless integrations, while providing clients with a convenient and reliable way to access and book the services they need. Whether handling individual appointments or managing a suite of services, CosmosLevel is geared to enhance organizational capabilities and improve the customer experience in a modern, digital-focused world.

For the purposes of providing CosmosLevel services, your personal data will be processed by us at HOP TRAINING SRL, located at Str. Morii 33B, Sat Valea Mare Podgoria, Arges, Romania, registered at the National Trade Register Office under no. J03/998/2021, Unique Registration Code 44131318. We manage the website
, in compliance with the provisions of EU Regulation 2016/679 on personal data protection (GDPR) as well as applicable national and European data protection legislation.

II. Your Rights and Our Obligations Regarding Personal Data Processing:
II. Your Rights and Our Obligations Regarding Personal Data Processing:

You have various rights regarding the access, rectification, erasure, and portability of your personal data, along with the right to object to processing and the right to withdraw consent at any time. These rights can be exercised by submitting a written request, signed and dated, to HOP TRAINING SRL at
. We will respond within one month from receipt of your request, which may be extended by two additional months if necessary.
We also commit to taking all necessary organizational and technical measures to secure your personal data and to inform you immediately in case of unauthorized access to personal data.
III. Personal Data Processed by CosmosLevel:
III. Personal Data Processed by CosmosLevel:
We may collect the following types of information:
• Personal identification information (Name, email address, phone number, etc.)
Personal identification information (Name, email address, phone number, etc.)
• User-generated content, such as reviews and feedback
User-generated content, such as reviews and feedback
• Technical data (IP address, browser type, operating system, etc.)
Technical data (IP address, browser type, operating system, etc.)

• The personal data of visitors to www.cosmoslevel.com are processed when accessing the Site, and according to our cookie policy, data such as IP, location, preferences, and interactions with visited pages are collected. The processing of this data is to ensure an optimal online experience and for marketing purposes.

are processed when accessing the Site, and according to our cookie policy, data such as IP, location, preferences, and interactions with visited pages are collected. The processing of this data is to ensure an optimal online experience and for marketing purposes.
• Various personal data are processed when creating a user account, making online reservations, and reviewing and rating professional services within the CosmosLevel platform.
Various personal data are processed when creating a user account, making online reservations, and reviewing and rating professional services within the CosmosLevel platform.

• When a professional (salon, clinic, or independent professional) desires to utilize CosmosLevel to manage bookings, they will register on the platform and their personal data will be processed as described. Professional Users will be expressly responsible for obtaining the consent of the other professionals associated with their business who are added to the platform.

• CosmosLevel offers chat support and assistance for using the platform or related services. Consent for processing personal data provided in these interactions is obtained by the act of initiating the support request.

Your information is used for the following purposes:
• To provide and improve our services

• To communicate with you about your account and services

• To personalize your experience on our platform

IV. Transfer of Personal Data Processed by CosmosLevel:
All personal data processed by CosmosLevel may be transferred in accordance with our data transfer policies, which comply with
and other applicable data protection laws.
We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with:
• Service providers who perform services on our behalf
Service providers who perform services on our behalf
• Legal authorities when required by law
Legal authorities when required by law
• Business transfers, should we be involved in a merger or acquisition
Business transfers, should we be involved in a merger or acquisition
We employ a variety of security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
We may transfer, process, and store your information on servers located outside of your home country, which may not offer the same level of data protection.
Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children without proper consent from a parent or guardian.

• Google Calendar Access and Use: At user request, CosmosLevel accesses and uses Google Calendar data to check for appointment conflicts. Data is stored for a duration of 30 days and deleted upon user's request for account deletion or earlier if requested.

• Google Data Storage and Sharing: Calendar event data and user refresh tokens are stored securely to update events. No sharing of Google data with third parties occurs unless specifically requested by the user or required by law. App’s use and transfer to any other app of information received from Google APIs will adhere to Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements.
